in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom

Class ContinuousTouchListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.custom.ContinuousTouchListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener

    public abstract class ContinuousTouchListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnTouchListener
    This class will detect user interaction with a particular View. If user continue touches that view, onTouchesCompleted will be fired. If user delay in touches, then touch counter will be reset and started again.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    13 Feb 2016

      private android.view.View view
